title: cultural_data_Tibet_Museum
text:
﻿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.transmii.tibetmuseumapp.
Application Name: Tibet Museum.
Number of Reviews: .
Application Description: Explore Tibet Museum's collection in an original and playful way, guided by Buddhist fables. Tibet Museum is the official app of Tibet Museum in Gruyères, Switzerland and is available to its visitors free of charge. It offers visitors an interactive experience to discover at the museum, as well as an augmented story ready to be revealed thanks to the poster available at the museum or downloadable at the following link: www.tibetmuseum.app/milarepa-poster.jpgRead moreCollapse.
